name: Bryant Dente
description:
I am honest and loving american man.
i’M A VERY HARD WORKING MAN’ I HAVE WORKED SO HARD ALL MY LIFE TO OWN ALL THAT I GOT IN LIFE TODAY BUT I STILL GOT ONE THING MISSING IN MY LIFE. EVER SINCE I LOST MY WIFE I HAVEN’T BEEN SO LUCKY TO FIND THE RIGHT WOMAN THAT COULD REPLACE HER PLACE IN MY HEART. BUT I KEEP BELIEVING THAT IT CAN ONLY GET BETTER WITH FAITH..
